data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Washim access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Washim, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Washim, Maharashtra, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Washim who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Washim, Maharashtra, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,184,031 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kachari (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Washim. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Washim hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Washim, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

location.name: Washim
location.cities_list: Wāshīm, Kāranja, Risod, Mangrūl Pīr, Anshing
location.cities_list_w_pop: Wāshīm (68,622), Kāranja (64,734), Risod (30,131), Mangrūl Pīr (29,198), Anshing (19,000)
